title: Analyzing heavy metal contamination for one of the high-rate consumption fruits in Iran: A probabilistic health risk assessment
content:
Publication date: 15 May 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 9

Author(s): Mohammad Rezvani Ghalhari, Nayereh Rezaei Rahimi, Mohammad Fahiminia, Elahe Noruzzade, Abooalfazl Azhdarpoor, Zeynab Koochakzadeh, Habib Vakili, Reza Fouladi-Fard
